long_desc.thetext:
There is two RTL issues in about:config on RTL fennec:
1- The string editing textbox is rtl. It should be ltr and text-aligned to right, since content of such strings are either urls or dates, and both should be displayed in ltr fashion.
2- The values of the config variables are aligned to the right. They should be aligned to the other end of the cell, to make the table looks as neat as the one in LTR Fennec (see attached screenshots).
Created attachment 523950 about:config in its current state
Created attachment 523951 How should about:config appear in RTL Fennec

Comment on attachment 523952 patch v1
Sounds good to me, I will add a comment on checkin above the #editor-setting[type="string"] .setting-input > textbox:-moz-locale-dir(rtl) rule to keep a trace why there is a text-align:right in this case.
I'm glad that you're actually fixing all my rtl leftovers!
Any time. Ping me whenever you have such delicious leftovers ;-)

attachment.desc: How should about:config appear in RTL Fennec
